text: Gezien studies die verband leggen tussen priv√©zorg en slechtere zorgkwaliteit, is er reden voor bezorgdheid over plannen om de Alberta Health Services te herstructurener. Alle Albertanen verdienen toegang tot hoogwaardige en gelijke zorg."[Translation: Given studies linking private care with lower quality of care, there is reason for concern about plans to restructure Alberta Health Services. All Albertans deserve access to high-quality and equitable care.]
